images.name: Mì Xào Hải Sản Với Gói Ngo Sen

reviews.content: Nice place for family gathering. Private room with AC available. Good food, good service
Ok
Ok
Good
Good
OK
The restaurant has an airy space. Attentive staff. Delicious food. There are private VIP rooms.
The staff were enthusiastic, their phone ran out of battery and they lent them a charger. Seeing me standing there, they lent me a spare charger.
The restaurant is spacious, airy, has a private air-conditioned room but must be booked early. The food is served quickly, the menu is diverse, delicious and the price is reasonable.

The restaurant is quite old, the dishes are normal, nothing outstanding, the spices are bland and not rich in flavor, only the beef stew is quite tasty, the crispy rice with pineapple fish is only crispy rice and the pineapple fish is not standard. Beer is quite expensive, 1/2 the price.

name: Jade Restaurant
policy: Khách hàng vui lòng liên hệ 84 363 050 246 để biết thêm chi tiết về chính sách của Jade Restaurant.

reviews.content: Wonderful food with top-notch excellent customer service. Very nice people and a very nice restaurant. I highly recommend
Perfect place for lunch. Not too crowded.

I have known the restaurant for a long time, but today I finally had the opportunity to try Dimsum Jade restaurant in Ben Van Don. - First, about the food at the restaurant: in my personal opinion, the food at …
베이징덕이나 2013. 20% discount on the price of the product. 4th century 위치되있고 장소도 Є어서 여럿이서 ذ도 됩니다. 격이 너무 착해서 많이 주문해도 되요. …

one morning on the street stopped at a red light right at the restaurant, ate a whole combo of spray paint why did the restaurant do the construction without covering it, everyone who passed by got it, the car parked right at the intersection got all white

I have experienced many restaurants in the District 1 and District 5 areas. Now for the first time, I learned that there is a new restaurant opening right in front of Ben Van Don Street, convenient to travel between District 1 and District …
Jade Restaurant moved from 2 Doan Nhu Hai. The new location is more convenient and beautiful, located in the Riverside wedding convention center.
Delicious food, beautiful view, reasonable price. For those who want to experience the Ben Van Don view of Riverside wedding party.
My family has held parties at this restaurant a few times, I rate the quality of service here quite well From the time of consulting on dishes for my family's party, they were very …

The food was quite tasty, the char siu wonton bowl had a few thick pieces of char siu, just the right amount of softness, the wonton was firm and didn't fall apart. My mother ate the seafood porridge and also praised the freshness of the food.

name: NGUYENS- Bến Vân Đồn
intro: Serves dine-in, Has drive-through, Has no-contact delivery
policy: Khách hàng vui lòng liên hệ 84 833 312 379 để biết thêm chi tiết về chính sách của NGUYENS- Bến Vân Đồn.

reviews.content: Tasty fresh food. My servant's spoken English was excellent and very helpful. Very kind servants, employees and employers. I will go there again. Thank you for the great dishes and comfortable stay. ☘️
We went at a quiet time so we received too much attention from a waiter but the food was absolutely amazing.

From the moment I walked in, I was impressed by the elegant decor and welcoming atmosphere.It was cozy and relaxing, with soft music and warm lighting. The menu offered a wide variety of dishes. The service was quick and polite.  I especially loved the tableware here — the dishes and bowls had such beautiful and unique patterns.

Head waitress is horrible. Unhelpful and greedy attitude. Every dish we asked for was "unavailable" except the most expensive ones (she kept insisting we - 2 people - have 1kg of some premium fish because that's "all they have"). When we …
Food is not bad but it’s expensive,  also charge room fee , service fee and tax 8%. No more visit anymore . One fish 1100k , 6 shrimps 800k , two person cost 3200k.
Good food. Little hard to find but worth the effort. Service very good & large variety of foods.
I have a great experience with Nguyens. Love the food so much. Also they have great whiskey and cigars.
This place was a setup They charge over  $5,000,000 for 2 people, bottle of wine, fish, over cook shrimp and slices of apple …
One of the good place to enjoy watching VN football match with some beer like the local way.

Nguyen’s is a great and accommodating restaurant. The food is fresh, fantastic, and reasonably priced. They even let us change the music and everything. The server Sang is fantastic and such an asset to the restaurant!
